anmts.title: Kurt Seiffert Team Rosters are posted in the Project Page
anmts.content:
I am a day later than I intended, but I have the team rosters  Download team rostersposted in the project page. Please check it out as soon as possible. Please let me know immediately if you see any problems with your team assignment. I do not think I missed anyone, but it would not be my first mistake or my last. 

Your client will be one of the AI's. That information is included in the roster. 

Your next step is to get together with your team. You should be:

Exchanging contact information
Deciding what are the top three themes your team would like to work on
Start talking about technology stacks you will use
Identify resources and training material for any technology your team has chosen
Discuss some actual projects you would like to do in each of your favorite themes. 
Record the minutes from your meetings. They will need to be submitted by Sunday midnight along with your rank ordered request of themes. 
You should also be talking with your client and arranging meeting times with them. 
You can contact either your client or myself with any questions. Any problems with team assignments should come to me, but feel free to CC your client if you like.
anmts.author: Kurt Seiffert
